Name: Epic Flail
About the game: Epic Flail is a fast paced 2D brawler with a gladiator theme that mimics the action packed fighting scenes from Japanese anime. Epic Flail has the player trapped in the arena, fighting through different modes and defeating other arena legends and even the gods themselves. Warning: This is a highly addictive game and you will spend hours challenging yourself and friends to see who be crowned the ultimate arena champion. • Visually beautiful graphics and amazing sound track • Adorable character to fight and brawl with • 'Hack N Slash' game play - 2D anime • Unique levels with challenging bosses • Progressive increase in level difficulty • Leaderboard & Achievements (High scores) ______________________________________________
